casebody.data:
HARTLEY READY MIX CONCRETE MANUFACTURING, INC.
v.
Timothy Aaron COBLE and Forsyth Redi-Mix, Inc. No. 71P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2019 Randolph M. James, Jeremy R. Demmitt, Winston-Salem, Jason M. Burton, H. Brent Helms, Attorney at Law, For Forsyth Redi-Mix, Inc. David E. Shives, Attorney at Law, For Coble, Timothy Aaron.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant (Forsyth Redi-Mix, Inc.) on the 28th of February 2019 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."
